Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that wearing the #Skull Mask in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a record setting fish (child)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Light Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #lonely Deku Scrub#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Morpha# holds...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #a Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Spirit Trial)

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Gerudo Training Ground#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Basement Eye Switch Room Grass 1
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Slopes)

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #outside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the soul of Barinade# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Push Block)

ToT (Right-Center).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a small fish (adult)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the soul of Volvagia# can be found in #the Graveyard#.
